remarks: This is a version of ~ ax-12 when the variables are distinct.  Axiom (C8) of [Monk2] p. 105.  See theorem ~ ax12v2 for the rederivation of ~ ax-c15 from this theorem.  (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.)  Removed dependencies on ~ ax-10 and ~ ax-13 .  (Revised by Jim Kingdon, 15-Dec-2017.)  (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 8-Dec-2019.)
statement:
ax12v $p |- ( x = y -> ( ph -> A. x ( x = y -> ph ) ) ) $.
$d x y $.
